mapper.select: SELECT e.USER_NO, e.USER_ID, e.USER_PWD, e.USER_NAME, e.BUSINESS_NAME, e.BUSINESS_NO, e.POSITION_NAME, e.POSITION_NO, e.MANAGER_NAME, e.SALARY, e.BONUS, e.PHONE, e.GENDER, e.ADDRESS, e.CREATE_DATE, e.IMAGE_CHANGE, e.IMAGE_ORIGIN, e.BIRTHDAY, e.STATUS, h.USER_NAME AS HEAD_NAME FROM MEMBER e LEFT JOIN MEMBER h ON e.MANAGER_NAME = h.USER_ID LEFT JOIN BUSINESSE b ON e.BUSINESS_NO = b.BUSINESS_NO LEFT JOIN POSITION p ON e.POSITION_NO = p.POSITION_NO WHERE e.USER_NO = #{userNo}

SELECT e.USER_NO, e.USER_ID, e.USER_PWD, e.USER_NAME, e.BUSINESS_NO, b.BUSINESS_NAME, e.POSITION_NO, p.POSITION_NAME, e.SALARY, e.BONUS, e.PHONE, e.GENDER, e.ADDRESS, e.CREATE_DATE, e.IMAGE_CHANGE, e.IMAGE_ORIGIN, e.BIRTHDAY, e.STATUS FROM MEMBER e LEFT JOIN BUSINESS b ON e.BUSINESS_NO = b.BUSINESS_NO LEFT JOIN POSITION p ON e.POSITION_NO = p.POSITION_NO WHERE e.USER_NAME = #{userName}
SELECT B.MONEY FROM BUSINESS B JOIN MEMBER m ON B.BUSINESS_NO = m.BUSINESS_NO WHERE m.USER_NO = #{userNo}
SELECT B.MONEY FROM MEMBER E JOIN BUSINESS B ON E.BUSINESS_NO = B.BUSINESS_NO WHERE E.USER_NO = #{userNo}
SELECT SUM(SELL_MONEY) FROM SELL WHERE BUSINESS_NO = #{businessNo} AND TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM')
